error.email_not_confirmed: Your email address has not been confirmed
error.otp_expired_description: The login link has expired or is invalid. Try again by requesting a new link.
error.access_denied_description: You do not have the necessary rights to access this page.
error.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please try again later.

login.checkSpamFirst: Don't forget to check your spam folder if you can't find the email.
login.resendWait: You can resend an email in {seconds} seconds.

magicLink.description: Login with a single click using a magic link sent to your email.
magicLink.sentDescription: We have sent you an email with a magic link to login. It expires in 60 minutes.
magicLink.linkResent: A new magic link has been sent to your email address.
magicLink.linkResendError: An error occurred while sending the magic link

otp.description: Login with a single click using a magic code sent to your email.
otp.sentDescription: We have sent you an email with a magic code to login. It expires in 60 minutes.
otp.enterCode: Enter the code received by email:
otp.invalidCode: The code is invalid, please try again.
otp.successMessage: Code verified. You are now logged in.
otp.codeResent: A new magic code has been sent to your email address.
otp.codeResendError: An error occurred while sending the magic code
otp.otpOnlyDigits: The code must contain only digits
